{{vgrelease|NA= December 3, 2009}} |genre= [[Adventure game|Adventure]] |modes= 1 player |ratings= [[Entertainment Software Rating Board|ESRB]]: E |platforms= [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]], [[Wii]], [[Nintendo DS]] |media=[[CD-ROM]], Online download through [[Steam (software)|Steam]] |requirements= |input= }} '''Safecracker: The Ultimate Puzzle Adventure''' is a video game developed by [[Kheops Studio]] and published by [[The Adventure Company]].[http://www.metacritic.com/games/platforms/pc/safecracker?q=safecracker Safecracker (pc: 2006): Reviews] Safecracker was also released on [[Steam (software)|Steam]] on August 29, 2007.[http://www.steampowered.com/v/index.php?area=news&id=1178 Steam - News] On February 2, 2007, [[PC Gamer#PC Gamer US|PC Gamer US]], awarded SafeCracker "Best puzzle game of 2007",[http://www.futureus-inc.com/archives/2007/02/the_13th_annual_1.php Future US] despite its sister [[PC Gamer#PC Gamer UK|magazine]] in the [[Great Britain|UK]], only giving it a score of 38%. ==Gameplay== The game is a [[first person adventure]] game, where the player moves through 3D environments, to find the safes to crack. The safes themselves vary in style and design, from safe to safe. ==Story== The games story revolves around a [[safe cracker]], being hired by the family of a recently deceased [[billionaire]] and [[Business magnate|oil magnate]], Duncan W. Adams. The player has been employed to find the will of Duncan W. Adams, by cracking the 35 [[safe]]s that were in his possession. ==Criticism== Safecracker received mixed reviews, with it being received well by PC Gamer US, and received poorly by [[PC Zone]], with some reviewers claiming about the difficulty curve of the game "very harsh spikes along the way"[http://www.strategyinformer.com/pc/safecracker/review.html Safecracker PC Review, Safecracker Player Reviews] and one reviewer calling the game "agonisingly unimaginative". {{Who|date=March 2009}} ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.theadventurecompanygames.com/safecracker_wii/index.php The Adventure Company's official website for SafeCracker] [[Category:2006 video games]] [[Category:Puzzle video games]] [[Category:Video games developed in France]] [[Category:Wii games]] [[Category:Nintendo DS games]] [[Category:Windows games]] {{Puzzle-videogame-stub}}
